title: Atlanta Hawks to Open 2015-2016 NBA Season on New Connor Sports Court at Philips Arena
text:
The Atlanta Hawks Basketball Club unveiled their new playing surface and court this past Saturday at Philips Arena in front of an enthusiastic crowd at the team’s annual open practice. The new hardwood, featuring the iconic Pac-Man logo and Hawks new colors of Volt Green, Georgia Granite Gray and Torch Red, is a custom-made Connor Sports QuickLock portable basketball court.
Atlanta, Georgia (PRWEB) October 05, 2015
The Atlanta Hawks Basketball Club unveiled their new playing surface and court this past Saturday at Philips Arena in front of an enthusiastic crowd at the team’s annual open practice. The new hardwood, featuring the iconic Pac-Man logo and Hawks new colors of Volt Green, Georgia Granite Gray and Torch Red, is a custom-made Connor Sports QuickLock portable basketball court.
The court is a visual representation of the next generation of Atlanta Hawks Basketball, and extends the team’s long-term partnership with CBA Sports , the Atlanta-based Connor Sports Court Builder. The new QuickLock basketball court from Connor Sports combines the latest in Forest Stewardship Council-certified northern maple hardwood selection and state-of-the-art manufacturing technology to create optimum resilience and player safety.
“The Atlanta Hawks have been a tremendous partner to CBA Sports in Atlanta,” said Jamie Sartin, Owner of CBA Sports. “Through CBA Sports, our Connor Sports and Sport Court brands have helped the franchise reinvigorate the Atlanta fan base, and the unveiling of the new Connor Sports QuickLock basketball court was the culmination of these activities.”
Earlier this summer, CBA Sports joined forces with the Atlanta Hawks Foundation to retrofit five community courts to increase access for metro Atlanta’s youth to play, grow, and learn life and leadership skills through basketball. They have done so by putting down safe and state-of-the-art, Atlanta Hawks themed Sport Court® Power Game game courts that allow the citizens of Atlanta to play on a surface with similar performance characteristics to those of the Connor Sports basketball court the Hawks will play on inside Philips Arena.
“We’re so proud to have a partner in CBA Sports and the Connor Sports and Sport Court brands,” said Hawks CEO Steve Koonin. “They are truly invested in helping us deliver a great experience to the citizens of Atlanta, whether it is through community programs in the parks or an outstanding game day presentation.”
About Connor Sports and QuickLock Systems:
Connor Sports® is the market leader in sports flooring, committed to building places Where Champions Play both on and off the court. Founded in 1872, Connor Sports has established themselves as the standard for professional and collegiate sports. Connor Sports QuickLock portable courts are the leading portable hardwood sports flooring system. Connor Sports QuickLock systems are the official basketball court of the NCAA® Final Four and the FIBA Basketball World Cup and is the court of choice for multiple NBA® teams. All QuickLock systems are manufactured in Michigan at an ISO certified facility and are DIN and STEM tested. Connor Sports specializes in maple hardwood courts, resilient sports flooring and vulcanized rubber track surfaces.
Learn more at http://www.connorsports.com or find us on Facebook @connorsports or Twitter @Connor_Sports
About Sport Court and Sport Court game courts:
Sport Court® is committed to building champions of the community. Since 1974, Sport Court has provided communities around the world a safe place to play. As the original game court company, Sport Court delivers the highest levels of quality and performance for both its backyard game court and community centers. Sport Court is proud to manufacture in the USA and to be the only game court company in the world that is independently audited and verified as "Zero Waste" and fully ISO 9001:2008 and ISO 14001 certified.
Learn more about Sport Court at http://www.sportcourt.com or find us on Facebook @sportcourt1974 or on Twitter @sportcourt1974
About CBA Sports:
Founded in 1992, CBA Sports is a sports construction firm specializing in performance athletic surfacing, sports floor systems, and sports components for both indoor and outdoor sports flooring projects. Our company is one of the largest and most proficient sports construction firms and is driven by the passion and commitment of its people. Every project, regardless of size or scope, gets the same attention to detail from a single flooring component to an entire sports complex; this is our philosophy and pride
From indoor gymnasium flooring, running tracks and weight rooms to outdoor basketball and tennis courts, CBA Sports is a sports construction industry leader. Our clients range from UGA, Georgia Tech, GSU, FSU, Atlanta Hawks to a host of professional athletes, public and private sports facilities and homeowners throughout the world. CBA Sports is an authorized Court Builder for Sport Court and Connor Sports.
Learn more about CBA Sports at http://www.cbasports.us or on Facebook @cbasports or Twitter @cba_sports_
ABOUT THE ATLANTA HAWKS BASKETBALL CLUB:
With a bold identity and strong new ownership, the Atlanta Hawks Basketball Club and Philips Arena remain committed to making Atlantans proud on the court and off. The 2014-15 Southeast Division Champions, the Hawks have made the postseason in eight consecutive seasons and reached the Eastern Conference Finals for the first time in franchise history in 2015. Off the court, the organization has built a culture of inclusion, diversity and innovation, all with a touch of Southern Hospitality. It continues into the community where the organization builds bridges through basketball, whether by constructing and refurbishing courts in Atlanta neighborhoods, providing scholarships to our basketball camps, or surprising and delighting our fans with unique Atlanta Hawks experiences. Atlanta Hawks Membership, which includes your seat for every home game for the 2015-16 regular season games, is on sale now at http://www.hawks.com/membership or by calling 866-715-1500! For more information on the Hawks, log on to http://www.hawks.com today or follow us on twitter @ATLHawks.
